'Rahul Dev Samra' (; ; born 27 September) is an Indian film actor and former
model. Dev is known for his unconventional rugged looks and chiselled features
and appearances in action films. He was meant to make his acting debut as the
main villain in Mukul S. Anand's 1997 film [[Dus (1997 film)|Dus]] but the
director's death while the film was still in production caused the film to
remain incomplete and unreleased. He then made his debut in the 2000 film
[[Champion (2000 film)|Champion]] where he played a villainous role and for
which he was nominated for the 2001 Filmfare Best Villain Award. He has since
played villains and supporting roles in all of his films, but is almost always
seen playing the villain. He acted villain in the Punjabi movies Dharti in 2011.
Rahul Dev's brother Mukul Dev is also an actor in films and television.
